short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple new tab page with color of your choice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension overrides default chrome new tab page with empty page.
Background color can be customized.

Use any format supported by CSS:
* Predefined color name
* Hexadecimal color
* RGB color
* RGBA color
* HSL color
* HSLA color

Color is saved to Chrome sync storage.
